name: CryptocurrencyExchangeRate
0:
”Alexa, give me the price of Bitcoin from Crypto Price.”
”Alexa, ask Crypto price what is the price of Ether in Euros?”
”Alexa, look up the price of Litecoin in pounds from Crypto Price.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto price
des:
Look up the current Coinbase spot prices for the three most popular cryptocurrencies directly from the Coinbase API. Simply ask for the current price of Bitcoin, Litecoin, or Ether and optionally specify the fiat currency you would like (USD, GBP, or EUR).

Source code available at https://github.com/jnowaczek/cryptoprice
